hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Qatida with the same chain of transmitters but (with this variation of wording):" Allah commanded the earth (from where) he wanted to come out to move itself away and to the other earth (where he wanted to go) to draw nearer

chapter.ara-name: باب قَبُولِ تَوْبَةِ الْقَاتِلِ وَإِنْ كَثُرَ قَتْلُهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Acceptance Of The Repentance Of The One Who Kills, Even If He Has Killed A Great Deal
